column1: Tuckborough was an old and important settlement in the Westfarthing of the Shire
column2: nestled in the Green Hill Country. A road connected Tuckborough with the Yale and Stock (with the Causeway) to the east. It was the location of Great Smials
column3: the ancestral seat of the Took Family
column4: the hereditary Thains of the Shire.

column2: towns and villages of the Shire
